technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Fetal cardiac activity present with FHR 5.08 bpm.
Major vessels show coarse waveform on Doppler.
Right kidney demonstrates ill-defined, no hydronephrosis.
Gallbladder shows homogeneous, no stones or wall thickening.
Left kidney shows mildly heterogeneous, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
